EmailTemplate.name: VHM - Trial Download.VMTurbo Differentiation
EmailTemplate.subject: What Makes VMTurbo Different?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{Lead.First Name}}, Free control ends in 2 days. Do you really want to go back to monitoring and alerts? Hasn't it been nice letting software to the work for you? Don't you want to work on projects that actually interest you and make a difference to your organization? If you're not ready to give up control, set up a demo with us. It's just 30 minutes. Our team of experts will give you a personalized walk through of VMTurbo, showing you just how VMTurbo will drive your environment to perpetual health. Sign up for a free 30-minute demonstration today! <http://vmturbo.com/product/request-a-demo?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=30_day_love&utm_content=28_day_expire> - The VMTurbo Team
